name: War Ni Chi
overview: The Kingdom of War Ni Chi has fallen into chaos! The joy of festivals no longer exists, homes are in ruins, homeless children are wandering everywhere ... In order to let the villages enjoy peace again, Preffy will use his extraordinary memory, logic and action to start a period of solution Jigsaw puzzle journey. Let's enter the WarNiChi kingdom that is in chaos, visit the villages in depth, and solve the problems for them!
